body.raw:
**Artifakt** is a 3D customization engine for online stores, letting buyers view and configure products in real-time before purchase—improving confidence and conversion.

**Benefits for brands**

- True-to-life 3D previews and options
- Lower return rates, higher AOV
- Easy integration into modern storefronts

_Use “Request a demo” to talk with our team._
